alert.note: Alert for Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 8:23PM CDT until August 01 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Otter Tail County in west central Minnesota... Wilkin County in west central Minnesota... Eastern Richland County in southeastern North Dakota... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 823 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Brushvale, or 9 miles north of Wahpeton, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wahpeton, Breckenridge, Rothsay, Abercrombie, Foxhome, Dwight and Kent. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 11 and 26. Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 30 and 42. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
